Author: flowersrooms
Text: i saw about the fires!!! i hope youâ€™re all doing okay and staying safe and cool in what must be a v difficult time <3. thank you so much for your nice words. youâ€™re right that i deserve to eat itâ€™s just like ... hard to internalize especially when i feel like the thinner i am the more positive reception i get from society. hope u have an amazing time in japan, please remember that YOU deserve to eat and enjoy yourself there ðŸ’•

Author: Neonmaelstrom
Text: i know im not being the most helpful, but with the weather that we're having here the air quality is so poor from all of the bushfire smoke that being outside isnt a good idea most of the time, so bathing suits may not be a worry. in all seriousness though, your family will not force feed you giant meals, dont forget that this is a vacation and you are valid and loved and you deserve to eat. i promise that you still look beautiful, also its pretty easy to eat healthy here anyway, i get what youre going through though, im going to japan with my family and i am freaking out because all of the videos i can find for japanese street food and stuff are super high calorie!! and theyre already suspicious!
